plot: Follows three patients on hospice care and explores the options people have at the end of life. We also learn what hospice care is and how it's given to different patients.
title: Except for Six
plot_es: Follows three patients on hospice care and explores the options people have at the end of life. We also learn what hospice care is and how it's given to different patients.
plot_en: Follows three patients on hospice care and explores the options people have at the end of life. We also learn what hospice care is and how it's given to different patients.
